detectors.description:
Reentrancy in EcosystemRewardsVesting.claim() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EcosystemRewardsVesting.sol#531-541):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(recipient,claimingAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EcosystemRewardsVesting.sol#533)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claimedReleases += releases (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EcosystemRewardsVesting.sol#540)

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [claimedReleases += releases](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EcosystemRewardsVesting.sol#L540)

detectors.description: EcosystemRewardsVesting.claim() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EcosystemRewardsVesting.sol#531-541) ignores return value by token.transfer(recipient,claimingAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EcosystemRewardsVesting.sol#533)
